messages.content: I have always seen it as my role to be there for local people - standing up for you in Parliament, and helping those who turn to me.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Joined together to fight cuts to Kingston Hospital.
Succeeded in our campaign to get police support through teams for every local community.
Supporting proposals for primary schools to have better funding to reduce class sizes and giving headteachers more funding to spend on what setting teachers free to teach.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two-horse race graphic showing Lib Dem and Con percentages with a statement about the strategic voting considerations indicating that votes beyond these parties would likely be distributed to Conservative.

issues.education: Our excellent primary schools would benefit from Nick Clegg’s education plans - setting teachers free to teach, reducing class sizes and giving headteachers more funding to spend on what school heads need.
issues.health: Glad so many thousands of people have joined together to fight cuts to Kingston Hospital.

housing.content: People also want to know that our streets are safe, especially at night.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived here for over 17 years, your concerns are my concerns.

politicalExperience.role: MP for Richmond Park & North Kingston
politicalExperience.achievements: Fought cuts to Kingston Hospital, achieved safety measures by getting police support for every local community.

contactInformation.address: 42 Upper Richmond Road West, London SW14 8DD

leaflet.additionalNotes: Includes a note that it's a two-horse race indicating tactical voting considerations.
